Description: Pilgrim's water-bottle (with iron hook), made of leather. With a turned wooden stopper (b). Used by pilgrims travelling to Mecca. Embroidered with an Ottoman tughra.
Curator's comments: No country given in documentation; "Hadji's bottle that has been to Mecca".
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2013 - 2014 9 Oct - 5 Jan, Doha, Museum of Islamic Art, 'Hajj - The Journey Through Art'
Acquisition notes: Transferred from Africa to Asia Collections,6/1988.
